wpt.name: GC3HAQT
wpt.desc: The New Church Bay Park and View by TogetherWeFind, Traditional Cache (2/2)
wpt.urlname: The New Church Bay Park and View

groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:name: The New Church Bay Park and View
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:long_description:
This cache is a series of Stop and View pull off's in Bermuda.
These caches will take you to some of the most beautiful views of Bermuda from up above looking down.
Church Bay Bermuda, located in Southampton parish, has always been one of our great favorites of all the beaches that are excellent for snorkeling.
This is a little cove formed by coral cliffs at the western end of the south-shore beaches.
We would take bus #7 to reach the Church bay beach park. The beach park is at the top of a small hill. A steep road from the park leads down to this wonderful beach.
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:encoded_hints: put your back to the ocean

groundspeak:log.groundspeak:text: Looked around for a little bit before making the find. A couple muggles drove or walked by, so we had to pause for a bit, but we found one of those Bermuda lizards while we were waiting. Found with dawnie22 and 19acassel.
